purpose: The email announces the 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes (MPLR'25), inviting submissions of research papers, work-in-progress papers, and industry/tool papers. It outlines the topics of interest, submission categories, author instructions, and important dates for the conference. The email also provides details on the review process and publication policies.
evidence_sentences: The 22nd International Conference on Managed Programming Languages & Runtimes (MPLR, formerly ManLang, originally PPPJ) is a premier forum for presenting and discussing novel results in all aspects of managed programming languages and runtime systems.
MPLR accepts three types of submissions: Regular research papers, Work-in-progress research papers, Industry and tool papers.
All submissions need to be in PDF format.
Important Dates: - Paper Submission Deadline: June 24, 2025 (extended) - Paper Author Notification: July 28, 2025 - Camera Ready for Papers: August 25, 2025 - Conference Date: October 14, 2025.
